channel.title: Posts on CCADB Migration Report
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on CCADB Migration Report

item.title: Report
item.description: Recommendation I recommend that, Pending the work outlined in the Work to be Done section, as well as review of the discovered semantic differences, that the CCADB be wiped and repopulated using the data parsed from each certificate’s PEM by the TLS Observatory. Other than the work that has been done to push for bugfixes in the Golang X.509 package, that the TLS Observatory’s output remain otherwise unchanged. That the CCADB’s schema remain unchanged.
